# allowedClasses

**Instance Property**

The set of coded classes allowed for secure coding.

## Declaration

```swift
var allowedClasses: Set<AnyHashable>? { get }
```

## Discussion

Secure coders check this set of allowed classes before decoding objects, and all objects must implement the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSSecureCoding] protocol.

## Secure Coding

- **requiresSecureCoding**: Indicates whether the archiver requires all archived classes to resist object substitution attacks.
